Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to increasing certain special accidental death benefits
Summary: Increases certain special accidental death benefits for state and local retirement system members.
LawCode: Amd ยง208-f, Gen Muni L; amd ยง361-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the retirement and social security law, in relation to increasing the special accidental death benefit of certain deceased members
